content: each st around = 12 sts round 3 single_crochet in each st around = 12 sts fasten_off leave the tail about 15 cm and cut the yarn one part is done repeat rnds 1-3 for the second part of the heart don t cut the thread when the second it is finished continue with red yarn from second part round 4 12 single_crochet around the 1st part s sts then make 12 single_crochet around the 2nd part s sts this is how parts are attached to each other = 24 sts then with the tail of the first part yarn you should do 1 slip_stitch inside them to prevent hole between round 5 single_crochet in each st decrease single_crochet in next 3 sts = 16 sts round 8 decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 3 plush heart crochet pattern by fionadolls 2 sts = 12 sts round 9 decrease single_crochet in next st single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next st = 8 sts now stuff the heart round 10 decrease single_crochet decrease * 4 times = 4 sts round 10 decrease single_crochet decrease * 2 times = 2 sts fasten_off with slip_stitch and hide the end of the thread that s all your heart is ready if you have any questions please feel free to contact me
